description:
VDI is not resized to the the correct local_gb specified in instance_type on the initial boot.  If I do a resize after the fact, the disk is corrected.

VDI should resize the image to the correct specified space for the initial boot.

This currently affects XenServer.
title: VDI is not resized to instance_type local_gb on initial boot

comments.content:
VDI is not resized to the the correct local_gb specified in instance_type on the initial boot.  If I do a resize after the fact, the disk is corrected.  

VDI should resize the image to the correct specified space for the initial boot.
